“kinam kanthawak thama niwase hara (thawath sthanayaka nomana karyak sandaha peni sitina adahas athiwa) thama andum galawanne nam aya allahge aාrakshawa nathi kara gani.” (abu dawud, thirmidi) muslim kanthawan thama andum piriminge andum ha samanawa nothibiya yuthu athara owunge andumda adima islamhi thahanam kara athi sema, pirimin se hasirimada islam thahanam kara atha.

wipakshaye wagakima wiya yuththe anoma fonseka magin janadhipathiwarayagen samawa illimata katayuthu salaswimayi - agamathi di. mu. jayarathna janapathi mudal amathi thanathura darimen thanathurak ahimi wuwakuta usawi yame awasthawa ahimi wela - rawi karunanayaka (ejapa) sarath fonsekage manthri dhuraya ahosi kirimata wadabalana maha lekamta balayak na - wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha aandukrama wyawasthawe hataweni waganthiya yatathe sarath fonsekage manthri dhuraya ahosi wenawa - widesha amathi ji. al. piris yuda adhikaranayata marana danduwama pawa labadiya hakiyi chandima wirakkodi (ejanisa) ajith alahakon - lasitha duminda wipakshaye wagakima wanne anoma fonseka mahathmiya idiriyata yawamin deshapalana wasi laba ganima nowa sarath fonseka mahatha wenuwen janadhipathiwarayagen samawa illa sitimata katayuthu kirima yayi agamathi di. mu. jayarathna mahatha eeye (08 da) parlimenthuwedi pawasiya.
